about_the_game:
Escape the Void is an extraction shooter set in a mysterious world brimming with magic, where you must push your limits to avoid being devoured by its creatures and dangers. You've been thrust into the Void, now facing malevolent energies and creatures that were consumed by it. Now it's time to join forces with other survivors of this realm and pool your strength to do everything possible to escape the Void.

Search for familiar faces and invite your friends to embark on this adventure with you! Venture through the Void together, loot, fight, and most importantly, survive. Utilize every item and crafted gear at your disposal so your team functions as one cohesive unit. Exploring unknown lands with a friendly face can be less intimidating, but that doesn't mean it will be any less dangerous.

Explore the Void, scavenge whatever you can, survive and find a way to escape... or die trying.

In this game you'll have to:
  • - Survive
  • - Loot
  • - Craft weapons and armor
  • - Upgrade your gear
  • - Manage Inventory
  • - Complete quests
  • - Level up
  • - Create enchantments
  • - Upgrade your skills
  • - Master your weapon
  • - And most important ESCAPE THE VOID!

name: Escape the Void

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Escape the Void is a top-down extraction shooter set in a magical fantasy universe. As a survivor in the void, work solo or in a party with up to 3 other players and uncover the truth about the void. Hunt, loot, craft items and gear, and try your best to survive.
